attributes.action: introduce a law stopping people offering commercial services hassling you in the street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am fed up of walking through the local town centre to have people with clipboards, leaflets, "charity muggers" and others from asking me if I want to participate or buy this that and the other. It is nothing short of harrassment and they don't seem to understand no for an answer, nor should I have to even say anything and just be left alone if I wish.

We call on the Prime Minister to ensure legislation to stop these people from hassling ordinary people going about their private business and make it mandatory that we can approach them but not the other way around. We have the right to privacy and this should be enforced.
